citations.narrative:
There are still some primary enclosure doors that are rusty. This rust does not allow these doors to be properly cleaned
and sanitized as required. Correct this by repairing or replacing these door surfaces.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Amanda Pope, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
3.1(c)(1)(i)  Repeat
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There are still some primary enclosure doors that are rusty.   This rust does not allow these doors to be properly cleaned 
and sanitized as required.   Correct this by repairing or replacing these door surfaces. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Amanda Pope, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
